Name: Stripe

Methods.Name: Get Refund
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details of an existing refund.

Methods.Name: List Updated Refunds
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all refunds new or updated since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Refunds
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all refunds you’ve previously created.

Methods.Name: Update Refund
Methods.Description: Updates a refund.

Methods.Name: Create Refund
Methods.Description: Creates a new refund.

Methods.Name: List New Products
Methods.Description: List all products since last run.

Methods.Name: List Products
Methods.Description: List all products.

Methods.Name: Create Product
Methods.Description: Create a new product.

Methods.Name: Get Product
Methods.Description: Get a product.

Methods.Name: New Event
Methods.Description: Use webhooks to be notified about events that happen in a Stripe account.

Methods.Name: List Coupons
Methods.Description: Returns a list of your coupons.

Methods.Name: List New Coupons
Methods.Description: Returns a list of your new coupons since last successful cycle.

Methods.Name: Create Coupon
Methods.Description: Creates a new Coupon

Methods.Name: Delete Coupon
Methods.Description: Deletes the specified Coupon

Methods.Name: Get Coupon
Methods.Description: Gets the specified Coupon.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Retrieves the details of an existing customer.

Methods.Name: Get Customer By Email
Methods.Description: Retrieves a customer by email address.

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Create a new customer in Stripe. If a source is included then the following fields are required: Object, Expiry Month, Expiry Year, Number, Currency and CVC.

Methods.Name: Delete Customer
Methods.Description: Permanently deletes a customer. It cannot be undone. Also immediately cancels any active subscriptions on the customer.

Methods.Name: List New Customers
Methods.Description: Returns a list of new customers created since the last successful cycle. The customers are returned sorted by creation date, with the most recent customers appearing first.

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Update a customer in Stripe. If a source is included then the following fields are required: Object, Expiry Month, Expiry Year, Number, Currency and CVC.

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: Returns a list of your customers. The customers are returned sorted by creation date, with the most recent customers appearing first.

Methods.Name: List New Tax Rates
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Tax Rates created since last cycle.

Methods.Name: List Tax Rates
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Tax Rates.

Methods.Name: List New Prices
Methods.Description: List all new prices since last run.

Methods.Name: Update Price
Methods.Description: Update a price

Methods.Name: Get Price
Methods.Description: Get a price

Methods.Name: Create Price
Methods.Description: Create price

Methods.Name: List Prices
Methods.Description: List all prices.

Methods.Name: List New Balance Transactions
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Balance Transactions created since last cycle.

Methods.Name: List Balance Transactions
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Balance Transactions.

Methods.Name: List Accounts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of accounts connected to your platform via Connect. If you’re not a platform, the list is empty.

Methods.Name: List New Accounts
Methods.Description: Returns a list of accounts that have been created since the last cycle that are connected to your platform via Connect. If you’re not a platform, the list is empty.

Methods.Name: List Plans
Methods.Description: Returns a list of your plans.

Methods.Name: List New Plans
Methods.Description: Returns a list of plans created since the last cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Plan
Methods.Description: Returns details of a single Plan

Methods.Name: Get Source
Methods.Description: Gets the details of a Source.

Methods.Name: Update Invoice Item
Methods.Description: Updates the amount or description of an invoice item on an upcoming invoice. Updating an invoice item is only possible before the invoice it’s attached to is closed.

Methods.Name: Update Invoice
Methods.Description: Until an invoice is paid, it is marked as open (closed=false). If you'd like to stop Stripe from automatically attempting payment on an invoice or would simply like to close the invoice out as no longer owed by the customer, you can update the closed parameter.

Methods.Name: List Invoice Line Items
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of line items associated with an Invoice.

Methods.Name: Pay Invoice
Methods.Description: Stripe automatically creates and then attempts to pay invoices for customers on subscriptions. We'll also retry unpaid invoices according to your retry settings. However, if you'd like to attempt to collect payment on an invoice out of the normal retry schedule or for some other reason, you can do so.

Methods.Name: Create Invoice
Methods.Description: This method can only be used if there is something to invoice for the customer, the cycle will fail otherwise. If you need to invoice your customer outside the regular billing cycle, you can create an invoice that pulls in all pending invoice items, including prorations. The customer's billing cycle and regular subscription won't be affected.

Methods.Name: Get Invoice
Methods.Description: Retrieves the invoice with the given ID.

Methods.Name: List New Invoices
Methods.Description: You can list all invoices, or list the invoices for a specific customer. The invoices are returned sorted by creation date, with the most recently created invoices appearing first.

Methods.Name: Delete Invoice Item
Methods.Description: Deletes an invoice item, removing it from an invoice. Deleting invoice items is only possible when they’re not attached to invoices, or if it’s attached to a draft invoice.

Methods.Name: Create Invoice Item
Methods.Description: Creates an item to be added to a draft invoice (up to 250 items per invoice). If no invoice is specified, the item will be on the next invoice created for the customer specified.

Methods.Name: List Invoices
Methods.Description: You can list all invoices, or list the invoices for a specific customer. The invoices are returned sorted by creation date, with the most recently created invoices appearing first.

Methods.Name: List All Persons
Methods.Description: Returns a list of people associated with the account’s legal entity. The people returned are sorted by date of creation, with the most recent appearing first.

Methods.Name: Create Subscription
Methods.Description: Creates a new subscription on an existing customer.

Methods.Name: List Subscriptions
Methods.Description: By default, returns a list of subscriptions that have not been canceled.

Methods.Name: Update Subscription
Methods.Description: Updates an existing subscription to match the specified parameters.

Methods.Name: Cancel Subscription
Methods.Description: Cancels a customer's subscription. If you set the at_period_end parameter to true, the subscription will remain active until the end of the period, at which point it will be canceled and not renewed. By default, the subscription is terminated immediately.

Methods.Name: Get Subscription
Methods.Description: Retrieves the subscription with the given ID.

Methods.Name: List New Subscriptions
Methods.Description: By default, returns a list of active subscriptions that have been created since the last successful cycle.

Methods.Name: Create Charge
Methods.Description: Creates a new Charge record in Stripe.

Methods.Name: Get Charge
Methods.Description: Get all the details of a Charge.

Methods.Name: List Charges
Methods.Description: Returns a list of charges.

Methods.Name: List New Charges
Methods.Description: Returns a list of charges created since last cycle.

MetaTile: Stripe Integration - Invoice & Subscription Automation - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Take the hassle out of managing your invoices & subscriptions with Cyclr's Stripe connectivity, letting you integrate with 3rd party apps.
